about_the_game:
In NekoPunch Island, you’re on a mission to defend a hidden stash of cheese from a relentless horde of mice, each one a clone created by the sinister Dr. Nesumi. On your side are Mo, Bo, and a growing team of loyal cats, all ready to fend off waves of enemies.

Each level challenges you to protect the cheese through multiple waves. Between attacks, gather resources, reinforce your defenses, and strategically deploy your cats. With each new wave, the challenge increases, but as long as one piece of cheese remains, victory is within reach.

Currently in early development, NekoPunch Island features a lively game world and core gameplay mechanics, with new characters and features to come. Release date TBD!
detailed_description:
In NekoPunch Island, you’re on a mission to defend a hidden stash of cheese from a relentless horde of mice, each one a clone created by the sinister Dr. Nesumi. On your side are Mo, Bo, and a growing team of loyal cats, all ready to fend off waves of enemies.

Each level challenges you to protect the cheese through multiple waves. Between attacks, gather resources, reinforce your defenses, and strategically deploy your cats. With each new wave, the challenge increases, but as long as one piece of cheese remains, victory is within reach.

Currently in early development, NekoPunch Island features a lively game world and core gameplay mechanics, with new characters and features to come. Release date TBD!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04
  • Processor: x86_64 CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full Vulkan 1.0 support
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard

name: NekoPunch Island

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x86_64 CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full Vulkan 1.0 support
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Defend your cheese stash in NekoPunch Island! Join Mo, Bo, and a growing team of heroic cats as they face endless waves of cloned mice led by the evil Dr. Nesumi. Gather resources, build defenses, and protect the cheese at all costs in this island survival adventure!
